abilities.name: Neurocytes
abilities.rule: While this unit is within Synapse Range of a friendly **TYRANIDS** unit (excluding **NEUROGAUNT** units), it has the **SYNAPSE** keyword.

unit_composition:
■ **1-2 Neurogaunt Nodebeasts***
■ **10-20 Neurogaunts**

**Every model is equipped with:** chitinous claws and teeth.

* *This unit can only contain 2 Neurogaunt Nodebeasts if it contains 20 Neurogaunts.*
